name: Poké Ball
text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for any Basic Pokémon or Evolution card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.text: Flip a coin. If heads, you may search your deck for any Basic Pokémon or Evolution card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

competitiveHistory: Poké Ball saw limited play due to its coin flip requirement. Pokémon Trader was generally preferred for reliable searching.

rulings.ruling: You only search your deck on a heads result.
On tails, the effect does nothing.
You must reveal the Pokemon you search for.
